IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ORGANIZE MEMBERS TO ADVOCATE FOR THEMSELVES AND TO ENSURE QUALITY PUBLIC SCHOOLS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO UNITE, ORGANIZE AND EMPOWER MEMBERS TO ADVOCATE FOR THEMSELVES, TO ENSURE A QUALITY PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR EVERY KENTUCKY STUDENT AND TO BE THE PREEMINENT VOICE FOR QUALITY PUBLIC EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE SUPPORT FOR PUBLIC EDUCATION AND ECONOMIC AND PROFESSIONAL SECURITY. ALSO TO PROVIDE FOR PROFESSIONAL EXCELLENCE AND HUMAN AND CIVIL RIGHTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: TO PROVIDE FOR PROFESSIONAL EXCELLENCE AND HUMAN AND CIVIL RIGHTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TO PROVIDE LEGAL SERVICES FOR MEMBERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ASSOCIATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C) (6) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. REVENUE DERIVED FROM SOURCES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO ITS EXEMPT PURPOSE, REFERRED TO AS "UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME," SUCH AS THAT DERIVED FROM ADVERTISING, MAY BE TAXABLE. THE ASSOCIATION HAS IMPLEMENTED THE ACCOUNTING GUIDANCE FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. UNDER THAT GUIDANCE, TAX POSITIONS NEED TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN IT IS MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAX AUTHORITIES. AS OF AUGUST 31, 2023, THE ASSOCIATION HAS NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ASSOCIATION FILES FEDERAL FORM 990. THE ASSOCIATION IS NOT CURRENTLY BEING EXAMINED AND MANAGEMENT BELIEVES ITS TAX-EXEMPT STATUS WOULD BE UPHELD UNDER EXAMINATION.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: ASPIRING EDUCATORS - DUES PAID ON BEHALF OF ASPIRING EDUCATORS
DISASTER RELIEF - ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO TORNADO AND FLOOD VICTIMS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS ARE MONITORED BY KENTUCKY EDUCATION ASSOCIATION PERSONNEL THROUGHOUT THE COMMONWEALTH OF KENTUCKY ON A GRANT BY GRANT BASIS BY RECEIPTS AND OBSERVATION OF WORK PERFORMED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY ARE ELECTED BY MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE AUDIT COMMITTEE ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. FORM 990 IS ALSO MADE AVAILABLE TO ANY BOARD MEMBER WHO WISHES TO REVIEW IT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE KEA ASSISTANT EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR FOR FINANCE SERVES AS THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST OFFICER ("CI OFFICER"), AND IN THAT CAPACITY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CI POLICY. THE CI OFFICER MONITORS THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CI POLICY, AND MAKES PERIODIC REPORTS REGARDING ITS IMPLEMENTATION TO THE KEA EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE KEA EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE SHALL RECOMMEND TO THE KEA BOARD OF DIRECTORS SUCH MODIFICATIONS IN THE POLICY AS IT MAY FROM TIME TO TIME DEEM APPROPRIATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALARIES ARE REVIEWED AND COMPARED TO DATA FROM OTHER STATES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT MAKE AVAILABLE ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO THE PUBLIC.
CHANGE IN LIABILITY FOR POST RETIREMENT HEALTH CARE PLAN 546,416.
NO CHANGES TO THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
